topRisks: Third-party dependency for SMS functionality requires external account management.
Accessibility compliance is partially verified, specifically regarding readable contrast.
Platform-wide error handling and user guidance details are not fully documented.
nextActions: Identify and select a third-party SMS provider for integration.
Perform a contrast ratio audit on the web UI to ensure full accessibility compliance.
Request detailed documentation on system-wide error handling and user guidance.
proofNotes: ReliefRoster aligns with 16 of 19 requirements directly.
SMS and accessibility contrast require additional configuration or verification.
All core functional requirements for registration and scheduling are fully met.
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration that allows for configurable form fields and data validation.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields and required/optional validation.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can easily manage events and set specific capacity limits for each shift.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits.

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteers can self-enroll in shifts and receive automated email confirmations upon signup.
evidenceQuotes: volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.
Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported.

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform supports automated email reminders with configurable timing, including the requested 24-hour and 2-hour intervals.
evidenceQuotes: Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS reminders are supported via integration with a third-party provider provided by the organization.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider if the organization supplies an account.
gapsOrQuestions: Which third-party SMS provider does RapidRelief prefer?
Will RapidRelief provide the SMS account credentials?

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can track attendance for every shift and specifically flag no-shows.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Comprehensive volunteer profiles are maintained, capturing skills, languages, certifications, and availability notes.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster includes built-in role-based access control for Admins, Coordinators, and Volunteers.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Messaging templates can be created in both English and Spanish, with coordinator control over the send language.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing registered volunteers, shifts, attendance, and hours.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes a dashboard that tracks volunteer counts, shift fill rates, attendance, and total hours.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: All key data including rosters and attendance logs can be exported in CSV format.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can send broadcast messages to specific segments based on skills or language preferences.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform maintains an audit log of key coordinator actions such as event creation and messaging.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings.
requirements.responseSummary: Organizations can configure specific data retention rules for inactive volunteer records.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: The UI supports keyboard navigation for key workflows, though specific contrast ratios are not explicitly documented.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.
gapsOrQuestions: Does the UI meet specific WCAG contrast ratio requirements?
Are all UI elements verified for high-contrast accessibility?

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster is a web-based platform that fully supports mobile and desktop browsers.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform is designed to support up to 5,000 volunteers, exceeding the requirement.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes data validation for registration, though broader error handling details are not specified.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with... required/optional validation.
gapsOrQuestions: Can you provide examples of the system's error messaging?
Does the platform include a help center or guided tours for users?

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data is exported in CSV format, which is a standard format accessible without proprietary tools.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: ReliefRoster by MatrixMint Solutions is a purpose-built volunteer coordination platform designed to streamline disaster relief efforts. By automating registration, scheduling, and bilingual communications, ReliefRoster enables RapidRelief Network to scale its operations efficiently while maintaining high reliability and data integrity.
evidenceVerificationNotes: All functional requirements mapped to Capability Brief evidence.
Identified partial coverage for SMS, contrast accessibility, and general error handling.
